response.original_title: The Fureys at home in Ireland
response.overview: For a tiny island on the rump of Europe, Ireland has produced an inordinate amount of musical talent, but for sheer vitality, colour and character, nothing and no one can touch the fabulous Fureys. They are now something of an institution as an international folk based group as they travel all over the world delighting audiences with both their musical ability and their humour.
response.title: The Fureys at home in Ireland
